title: Kernel dies/restarts when starting GUI
body:
MacOS(HighSierra), Anancoda, DLC 2.0, Chrome

Working on my project in Jupyter on my iMac(intel Ci5, 12GB DDR3) . All was set up as before on my mac laptop that worked fine. When I ran the code 

%gui wx
deeplabcut.label_frames(path_config_file)

I go the following error on my bash command and the Kernel restarts.....

[I 21:22:27.188 NotebookApp] Starting buffering for 42e5c615-a2cb-4c21-a20a-8a3fabd66019:ddc91ee9c16b4f64a7fa05e9716ca05b
[W 21:22:39.161 NotebookApp] 404 GET /nbextensions/widgets/notebook/js/extension.js?v=20181205211301 (::1) 1.96ms referer=http://localhost:8888/notebooks/anaconda3/envs/DLC/DLC-Biomechanics.ipynb
[I 21:22:39.787 NotebookApp] Adapting to protocol v5.1 for kernel 42e5c615-a2cb-4c21-a20a-8a3fabd66019
2018-12-05 21:23:47.102 python[2209:62292] -[TKApplication transformToForegroundApplication]: unrecognized selector sent to instance 0x7ff94491d180
2018-12-05 21:23:48.189 python[2209:62292] *** Terminating app due to uncaught exception 'NSInvalidArgumentException', reason: '-[TKApplication transformToForegroundApplication]: unrecognized selector sent to instance 0x7ff94491d180'
